actions.name: Reverberate

cost.trigger: The user is targeted by a [Sonic] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is targeted by a [Sonic] attack.

Effect: If the triggering attack is either a Physical or Special-Category attack, it gains [Recoil 1/4] (or has its [Recoil X] increased by +1/4). If the triggering attack is Status-Category the triggering creature is Flinched.

system.description:
Trigger: The user is targeted by a [Sonic] attack.

Effect: If the triggering attack is either a Physical or Special-Category attack, it gains [Recoil 1/4] (or has its [Recoil X] increased by +1/4). If the triggering attack is Status-Category the triggering creature is afflicted with @Affliction[flinched] 3.
